answer:
QUESTION

my elder brother purchase a new car,but sumhas told him that u dont keep the car on your name or else you will be in loss.metal doesn't suits you.so now you tell us is it true that metal has some connection,and if my brother will keep the car on his name then will be some problem please answer

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

There is nothing wrong with your brother keeping a car registered under his name.  Additionally, there is no connection between metal and having problems. 


 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best

Wassalāmu ῾alaykum 




Ml. Musa Sugapong,
Student Dārul Iftā
